mapper.sql: uuid, userName, pwd, name, email, tele, address, gender, birthday, depUuid, roleId, lastLoginIp, logintimes
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tbl_emp
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID();
insert into tbl_emp (uuid, userName, pwd, name, email, tele, address, gender, birthday, depUuid, roleId, lastLoginIp, logintimes) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{depuuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logintimes,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update tbl_emp
uuid = #{record.uuid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
userName = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{record.pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tele = #{record.tele,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{record.gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birthday = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT},
depUuid = #{record.depuuid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
roleId = #{record.roleid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lastLoginIp = #{record.lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logintimes = #{record.logintimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update tbl_emp set uuid = #{record.uuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, userName = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{record.pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tele = #{record.tele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{record.gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT}, depUuid = #{record.depuuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, roleId = #{record.roleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, lastLoginIp = #{record.lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logintimes = #{record.logintimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_emp
userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tele = #{tele,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT},
depUuid = #{depuuid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
roleId = #{roleid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lastLoginIp = #{lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logintimes = #{logintimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_emp set userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tele = #{tele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT}, depUuid = #{depuuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, roleId = #{roleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, lastLoginIp = #{lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logintimes = #{logintimes,jdbcType=INTEGER} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT te.*, td.name as depName FROM tbl_emp te LEFT JOIN tbl_dep td ON te.depUuid = td.uuid
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT te.*, td.name as depName, td.uuid as depId FROM tbl_emp te LEFT JOIN tbl_dep td ON te.depUuid = td.uuid where te.uuid=#{uuid}
SELECT te.*, tr.uuid as jueseid FROM tbl_emp te LEFT JOIN tbl_emp_role ter ON te.depUuid = ter.empUuid LEFT JOIN tbl_role tr ON tr.uuid = ter.roleUuid WHERE te.uuid =#{uuid}
